revealedOnceUnlocked: Details for each achievement will be revealed once unlocked
dirDisclaimer: Where to look for achievements files :
publicProfile: Steam must be installed and your Steam profile public !
souvenirDescription: Take a screenshot when you unlock an achievement
toastSouvenirDescription: Display souvenir screenshot inside the toast (Win10 only)
notificationDescription: Notify on achievement unlock when possible
customToastAudioDescription: Specifies the sound to play when a toast notification is displayed
customUserFolderInfo: Select a folder which contains appid folder(s).
For ALI213, Hoodlum, RPCS3 please select a folder where the
ALI213.ini, valve.ini, hlm.ini, ds.ini or RPCS3.exe file is located.
blacklistInfo: Right click on a gamebox to add it to the blacklist.
timeMergeRecentFirstDescription: When merging duplicates, which time value is preferred ?
rumbleDescription: Vibrates first controller when unlocking an achievement
